Argent Arrow.name: Argent Arrow
Argent Arrow.flavor: You whisper a magic word over the arrow nocked on your bow, and it glows with a silver radiance. When you loose it, the arrow throws your target a short distance through the Feywild.
Argent Arrow.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you teleport the target 1 square.
Argent Arrow.special: This attack ignores cover, including superior cover. (You must still have line of sight to attack the target.)

Unrestricted Movement.name: Unrestricted Movement
Unrestricted Movement.flavor: You whisper to the wind, and the trees silently twist to ease your path. You and those under your care enjoy safe and swift passage for a time.
Unrestricted Movement.targets: You and each ally in the burst
Unrestricted Movement.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the targets ignore difficult terrain.

Binding Arrows.name: Binding Arrows
Binding Arrows.flavor: Your arrows suddenly sprout vines and roots after they strike, latching onto nearby trees and burrowing into the earth at your  enemyâ€™s feet.
Binding Arrows.target: One, two, or three creatures and/or unoccupied squares
Binding Arrows.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex (or Dexterity vs. 10 if square is unoccupied), one attack per target
Binding Arrows.onHit:
If a creature is hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
If a square is hit: Creates a 1-square-radius zone centered on the square until the end of the encounter. A creature passing through the zone or starting its turn in the zone is slowed until the end of its turn.
